Title: Allows the New York state thruway authority to provide a discounted toll rate to farmers transporting agricultural products
Summary: Allows the New York state thruway authority to provide a discounted toll rate to farmers transporting agricultural products.
LawCode: Add ยง354-a, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to allowing the New York state thruway authority to provide a discounted toll rate to farmers transporting agricultural products
